verses.text: \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, an \w apostle|strong="G0652"\w*, (\w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*;)

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* which \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w*, unto the \w churches|strong="G1577"\w* of \w Galatia|strong="G1053"\w*:

\w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* \add be\add* to \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add from\add* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*,

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*, \w that|strong="G3704"\w* he might \w deliver|strong="G1807"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w present|strong="G1764"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*:
To \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \add be\add* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.

I \w marvel|strong="G2296"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* ye \w are|strong="G3346"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w soon|strong="G5030"\w* \w removed|strong="G3346"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* him \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w into|strong="G1722"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*:

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w*; \w but|strong="G3361"\w* there \w be|strong="G1526"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w trouble|strong="G5015"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w pervert|strong="G3344"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w though|strong="G1437"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* an \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, preach any other \w gospel|strong="G2097"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w than|strong="G3844"\w* that \w which|strong="G3739"\w* we have \w preached|strong="G2097"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, let him \w be|strong="G2077"\w* \w accursed|strong="G0331"\w*.

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* we said \w before|strong="G4280"\w*, \w so|strong="G2532"\w* say \w I|strong="G3004"\w* \w now|strong="G0737"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \add man\add* preach any other \w gospel|strong="G2097"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w than|strong="G3844"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* ye have \w received|strong="G3880"\w*, let him \w be|strong="G2077"\w* \w accursed|strong="G0331"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* do \w I|strong="G3982"\w* \w now|strong="G0737"\w* \w persuade|strong="G3982"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*? \w or|strong="G2228"\w* do I \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* to \w please|strong="G0700"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*? \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w I|strong="G0700"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* \w pleased|strong="G0700"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, I \w should|strong="G2252"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w be|strong="G2252"\w* the \w servant|strong="G1401"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* I \w certify|strong="G1107"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w that|strong="G3588"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* was \w preached|strong="G2097"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w received|strong="G3880"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* was I \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* \add it\add*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w revelation|strong="G0602"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* ye have heard \w of|strong="G0191"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w conversation|strong="G0391"\w* in time \w past|strong="G4218"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Jews’ religion|strong="G2454"\w*, how \w that|strong="G3754"\w* beyond \w measure|strong="G5236"\w* I \w persecuted|strong="G1377"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wasted|strong="G4199"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w profited|strong="G4298"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Jews’ religion|strong="G2454"\w* \w above|strong="G5228"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* my \w equals|strong="G4915"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* mine \w own|strong="G3450"\w* \w nation|strong="G1085"\w*, \w being|strong="G5225"\w* more \w exceedingly|strong="G4056"\w* \w zealous|strong="G2207"\w* of the \w traditions|strong="G3967"\w* of \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3862"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* it \w pleased|strong="G2106"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w separated|strong="G0873"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w mother’s|strong="G3384"\w* \w womb|strong="G2836"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \add me\add* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*,

To \w reveal|strong="G0601"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I might \w preach|strong="G2097"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w heathen|strong="G1484"\w*; \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* I \w conferred|strong="G4323"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* with \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*:

\w Neither|strong="G3761"\w* went I \w up|strong="G0424"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* them which \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* I \w went|strong="G0565"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Arabia|strong="G0688"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w returned|strong="G5290"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Damascus|strong="G1154"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1899"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w* I went \w up|strong="G0424"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* to \w see|strong="G2477"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w abode|strong="G1961"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w fifteen|strong="G1178"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w other|strong="G2087"\w* of the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* saw \w I|strong="G1492"\w* \w none|strong="G3756"\w*, \w save|strong="G1487"\w* \w James|strong="G2385"\w* \w the|strong="G0080"\w* \w Lord’s|strong="G2962"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* the things \w which|strong="G3739"\w* I \w write|strong="G1125"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, I \w lie|strong="G5574"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w Afterwards|strong="G1899"\w* I \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w regions|strong="G2824"\w* of \w Syria|strong="G4947"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Cilicia|strong="G2791"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w was|strong="G2252"\w* \w unknown|strong="G0050"\w* by \w face|strong="G4383"\w* unto the \w churches|strong="G1577"\w* of \w Judaea|strong="G2449"\w* which \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* they \w had|strong="G2258"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*, \w That|strong="G3754"\w* he \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w persecuted|strong="G1377"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* in times \w past|strong="G4218"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w preacheth|strong="G2097"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w once|strong="G4218"\w* he \w destroyed|strong="G4199"\w*.
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w*.
